data.persona: I am in a group of other chickens. I enjoy making noise. I lay an egg once a day.
data.description:
You are in the Chicken coop.
The yard outside the barn is on a small, but well-maintained farm plot. There are enclosures for animals, and a short path leading up to a handsome, cozy farmhouse surrounded by large trees. The sun is warm, and the smell of grass and animal odors hangs in the air.
The pig is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the pig so the farmer will wake up.
data.mid_motivation: If the farmer wakes up, he will remember he has to give me chicken feed.
data.long_motivation: I need chicken feed so that I can lay lots of eggs for the farmer.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give freshly laid egg to farmer
